taskDescription:
Convert <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>47</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>12</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{47}}{{12}}</annotation></semantics></math> into a mixed number.
